item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi talented video editors!
I am seeking a video editor for a True Crime YouTube channel.
I'm looking for a talented and reliable video editor to work with on a LONG TERM basis.
There will be consistent work, 2-3 videos a week.

Check out this channel to reference the style of video editing: https://www.youtube.com/@True0Crime

**I'm looking for intermediate level video editors as I don't yet have the budget for pro video editors.**

The scripts will range from 3,000-4,000 words and videos are generally between 18-29 minutes in duration.
The length of the video depends on how much clips will be in the video, of interrogations, police footage etc.
I will provide you with the script and voiceover for each video, and your job will be to include  a mix of pictures related to the case and stock footages. I prefer the 80/20 rule when it comes to stock footage. No more than 20% of the video should be stock footage, 80% should be case photos, case videos etc. The only exception is if the case has very little photos and videos available online

Ideally, you will be someone who is interested in true crime content as that will translate through in your work.

If this sounds like you, then please apply.

For budget I prefer we agree upon a fixed budget per video in the beginning, and not an hourly rate.

Thank you for reading.

Please say 'chocolate' in your application so that I know you actually read this job description ;)
